column1: 441211,Emergency Service Worker,,"Provide first aid or rescue assistance in emergencies
column5: Communicate safety or hazard information to others
column7: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column15: Prepare hoses or water supplies to fight fires
column17: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column21: Inspect facilities to ensure compliance with fire regulations
column23: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column25: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column33: Analyse security of systems, network or data
column35: Attend training sessions or events to develop or maintain professional knowledge
column37: Position patients for treatment or examination
column39: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column43: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column45: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
